thread.title: Celebrations, congratulations and death threats: Twitter reacts to the Petr Cech transfer
thread.title_full: Celebrations, congratulations and death threats: Twitter reacts to the Petr Cech transfer - Telegraph

author: Callum Davis
title: Celebrations, congratulations and death threats: Twitter reacts to the Petr Cech transfer
text: Petr Cech was officially unveiled as an Arsenal player on Monday afternoon, and as per usual fans and players alike took to Twitter took to Twitter to air their views on the biggest transfer of the summer so far. Five key factors behind the most unlikely deal of the summer Cech thanks Abramovich from the 'bottom of my heart' Arsenal's official Twitter account were first to break the news and kicked off the ensuing online frenzy. It’s official? @PetrCech has agreed to join @Arsenal ! Full story here: http://t.co/09V3x81fiQ #WelcomeCech pic.twitter.com/Ov0UmAk2U5 — Arsenal FC (@Arsenal) June 29, 2015 Arsenal players flocked to welcome their new team mate... @MesutOzil1088 @Arsenal danke schön — Petr Cech (@PetrCech) June 29, 2015 Wow what a signing! One of the best @premierleague keepers ever! Welcome @PetrCech ... https://t.co/9TqlyGQtIq — Aaron Ramsey (@aaronramsey) June 29, 2015 Scored my first ever arsenal goal against him - delighted to welcome @petrcech to @arsenal !!! #WelcomeCech pic.twitter.com/9bBpr7nqVP — Theo Walcott (@theowalcott) June 29, 2015 The reaction on Twitter perfectly encapsulated the sheer joy of Arsenal fans... #ThatMomentWhen Chelsea fans see pictures of Petr Cech in an Arsenal shirt. pic.twitter.com/tA6pqk4JEm — BBC Sporf (@BBCSporf) June 29, 2015 When Arsenal fans find out Petr Cech is finally a Gooner... https://t.co/GahzuuNvXm — BreatheSport (@BreatheSport) June 29, 2015 Arsene Wenger's satisfaction with the transfer was frighteningly illustrated... https://t.co/zeUvuBu64r When you sign Cech against Mourinho's will — Alex (@Alex_is_Sanchez) June 22, 2015 Arsene #Wenger welcomes Petr #Cech to #Arsenal http://t.co/HZCXVNZqDx https://t.co/jl3R6IK2HH — Bleacher Report UK (@br_uk) June 22, 2015 Whilst the despair of Jose Mourinho and Chelsea fans was laid bare... Chelsea fans after Sky confirmed Cech deal is done to Arsenal ! https://t.co/Edb1V217px — Arsenal Future (@madimaadi) June 23, 2015 Hey Jose! -Can you reject Arsenal bid to Petr Cech? Mourinho: pic.twitter.com/31X4QMtWFS #Arsenal #Chelsea — Arsenal (@ALGunnersnews) June 19, 2015 Mourinho on Cech to Arsenal https://t.co/ataJqQ8A99 — ?echerined (@Bellerined) June 29, 2015 When Mourinho saw @Arsenal announcement of Petr Cech. #WelcomeCech https://t.co/PxcxDi47br — Obsessed Gooner (@Xeieshan_Gunner) June 29, 2015 Snake @PetrCech pic.twitter.com/epzlhQHeSm — Moe. (@NoLaughingMata) June 29, 2015 Not all the Chelsea reaction was so bitter... @didierdrogba thank you legend — Petr Cech (@PetrCech) June 29, 2015 It was a pleasure to play with you @PetrCech ! #ThankYouPetr ! Good luck!Fue un placer! Buena suerte amigo! #CFCLegend pic.twitter.com/BL1gDwTvcm — César Azpilicueta (@CesarAzpi) June 29, 2015 Good Luck Big Pete It's been an absolute pleasure mate, You have won everything and been the very best season after season. CHELSEA LEGEND @chelseafc #legend A photo posted by John Terry (@johnterry.26) on Jun 29, 2015 at 10:02am PDT
